title: Some newsrooms take steps toward a different kind of hiring process
description: Would you send a job candidate their interview questions ahead of time? Or spend over an hour talking with an applicant, when the meeting was slated for just 30 minutes? Although the hiring process can sometimes seem broken, leaving employers exhausted and applicants disappointed, there are glimmers of possibility in the field for a better...
